抱歉，我们无法让您登录bn 564 ，抱歉我无法让烤迪克的亲妈活着

日安，各位，今天我作为曾经的1400h玩家为大家介绍这款游戏：
        它，由暴雪娱乐公司倾情制作，豪门世家
        它，获得2016年tga最佳游戏奖项，荣誉显著      
        它，结合时势，根据世界格局灵活改变人物设定，张弛有度
        它，开展电竞赛事，赛制与规模立志对标nba，雄心壮志
        它，为缓解世界人民饥荒问题，积极发给广大玩家大饼，和平公益
在这款游戏中，你将能够体验到：
        粪坑蝶泳的竞技环境
        畸重畸轻的英雄平衡
        血压患者的的天梯分数
        锱铢必较的免费奖励
        首都房价的付费内容
        飘渺微薄的人机博弈
同时，这款游戏具有：
        老态龙钟的白人基佬
        浓眉大眼的黑人基佬
        身娇体弱的亚裔基佬
        肤白貌美的白人拉拉
        赛博飞升的黑人拉拉
        一如既往的小丑玩家

[h1]Don't bother with this game[/h1]

I started playing this game when the open beta in 2016 came out and fell in love with it right away. I kept playing it throughout the years even when they focused on ow2 and left the base game without new content because i believed in the team behind it.

I wish i would have just moved on because after that its been nothing but disappointment after disappointment. And every time you think they hit a new low and they couldn't possibly do anything worse, they come up with something else even worse to prove you wrong. At this point I stopped caring. I'm not getting mad anymore over it. I'm just disappointed to see a game that was so great and i spend thousands of hours playing being reduced to some trash. 

Overwatch really went from a beloved game that people cared about to whatever empty husk it is now. I'm surprised that there's still people out here defending this.

[b]Everyone involved with the decisions that were made in the last few years should be embarrassed and ashamed of themselves.[/b]
添加标签：恶心的厂商

OVERWATCH 1 FUÉ UN GRAN JUEGO, OVERWATCH 2 ES UN DESASTRE.
NO OS MOLESTEIS NI GASTEIS TIEMPO NI GIGAS (35) EN ESTE F2P ENMASCARADO CON PAGOS ABUSIVOS.
MISIONES DE HISTORIa DE PAGO (ANTES ERAN GRATIS)  AHORA 15€.
PASE DE BATALLA 10€ CON RECOMPENSAS IRRISORIAS Y QUE NO PUEDES FARMEAR EL SIGUIENTE PASE, BUENO SI, SOLO LA MITAD. TE OBLIGA A PAGAR 1 PASE CADA DOS TEMPORADAS.
EL MATCHMAKING ESTÁ ROTOSIMO.
HAY MUCHOS HEROES DESBALANCEADOS.
MUY POCOS PARCHES DE BALANCE.
GANAR PARTIDAS SOLO SOPONE SUBIR EN UN RANKING DESBALANCEADO. NO HAY RECOMPENSAS QUE INSPIREN ESFORZARSE EN GANAR.
COSMETICOS RECICLADOS Y CARISIMOS (22€ UNA SKIN)
MUCHA TOXIDAD, HACKS, AFK, ABANDONOS, TROLLEOS QUE HACEN LAS PARTIDAS INJUGABLES Y NADA DIVERTIDAS.
BLIZZARD SE LA SUDA Y NO HACE NADA.
EL CAMBIO A F2P PROMETIÓ MUCHAS COSAS QUE NO HAN LLEGADO. MODO HISTORIA CON MAESTRIA DE HEROES QUE NO HA LLEGADO PERO NOS VENDEN DE FORMA LIMITADA POR TROZOS Y A 15€
ESTAFA DE JUEGO.
